tooltips.principalTooltip: The amount of money you will start depositing.
tooltips.monthlyContributionTooltip: The amount of money you can monthly invest after your initial deposit.
tooltips.increaseRateTooltip: The percentage you can add to your monthly contributions.
tooltips.interestTooltip: The average growth you expect to earn on your investment.
tooltips.yearsTooltip: The number of years depositing monthly contributions.
